snippet: The network's new show, "Golden Boy," is yet another crime drama. And "Rules of Engagement" is again serving backup duty, replacing the canceled sitcom "Partners."
abstract: The network's new show, "Golden Boy," is yet another crime drama. And "Rules of Engagement" is again serving backup duty, replacing the canceled sitcom "Partners."

headline.main: CBS Tweaks Its Lineup, Adding a Drama and Returning to 'Rules of Engagement'
